Plots a coordinate system for proportion of deaths dx for a single life table.

Source: R/plot_functions.R
mortaar_plot_dx_frame.Rd

Plots a coordinate system for proportion of deaths dx for a single life table.

Usage

mortaar_plot_dx_frame(x, my_subsets = "", n, ...)

Arguments

x

an object of the class mortaar_life_table.

my_subsets

a vector of categories from the sublist of mortaar_life_table.

n

number of individuals.

...

further arguments passed to the print function.

On this page
